record.titleTypeName: Radio and Signal School, Administration Offices
record.description: Civilian students, holding up the parade, present their passes to sentry at the gate of Burton-Judson shortly before the Navy vacated and while civilians were occupying part of the dorms. The student in the levis is Roderick MacLeish, nephew of Arhibald MacLeish, librarian of Congress and poet extraordinary. The women were Waves.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: See cover and pp. 1 UC Magazine, Dec. 1944. Negative on file.
